sense.gloss: reciting (to oneself), repeating (e.g. an order, to confirm one heard it correctly)
loving to recite (e.g. a poem), reciting with great fondness
memorizing (a poem, etc.) and reciting it
learning by memorization, learning by memorisation

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓の↑娘↑↓むすめ↓はたくさんの↑詩↑↓し↓が↑暗誦↑↓あんしょう↓できる。
sdata.e: Her daughter can recite many poems.

sdata.j: ゲーテの↑詩↑↓し↓「ミニヨン」は↑日本↑↓にほん↓では↑森↑↓もり↓↑鷗外↑↓おうがい↓の↑名訳↑↓めいやく↓で↑広↑↓ひろ↓く↑愛誦↑↓あいしょう↓されてきた。
sdata.e: Goethe's poem "Mignon" is widely read in Japan in Mori Ogai's excellent translation.

words.gloss: reciting (to oneself), repeating (e.g. an order, to confirm one heard it correctly)
loving to recite (e.g. a poem), reciting with great fondness
